verbose_text: The overexpression of PAP1 in pap1-D activation tagging lines and 35S :P AP1 transgenic plants leads to high accumulation of anthocyanins in leaves, stems, flowers and roots [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: overexpression of PAP1 in pap1-D activation tagging lines and 35S:PAP1
